jobDescription: OverviewLoanMe has an opportunity for a Part Time Recovery Representative to join our team working from a home office. You will present a professional image as you appear in Small Claims Court representing LoanMe as the Plaintiff and presenting our cases to get a favorable ruling. After each appearance you will document the results using a company supplied laptop. Our loans are typically used for one-time purchases or debt consolidation.
